description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Murder Miners is the #1 rated Xbox Indie Game in the US. It's a fast-paced first-person shooter that combines some of the best aspects from our favorite games. Includes destructible environments, 20 players online, 4 player split-screen, vehicles, competitive deathmatch, CTF, Zombie Survival, Infection, and Murder Games! Tons of maps have been made by our fans. Join us at JForceGames.com.
